DIA_Loafs_VZ_Ambient_03_03: A lot of good people died here... Hopefully what we've found here will at least help compensate their families for this loss.
DIA_Loafs_VZ_Ambient_03_02: I'm coping, but I'm not convinced about the rest. We have fewer and fewer people, be careful no one starts a riot.
DIA_Loafs_VZ_Ambient_03_01: You better be careful, such casualties at the very beginning of the expedition does not bode well.
